Posts.Content: Good afternoon everyone. I would like to know if anyone has has to go back for a biopsy for a complex cyst? My gyn dr. said it's nothing that the other dr. who read the report is just being cautious. I did have thyroid cancer and had surgery this past January. A little nervous. Thank you for any help and advice.
Posts.Title: What is a complex cyst

Posts.Content: Good afternoon everyone. I would like to know if anyone has had to go back for a breast biopsy for a complex cyst? My gyn dr. said it's nothing that the other dr. who read the report is just being cautious. I did have thyroid cancer and had surgery this past January. A little nervous. Thank you for any help and advice.
Posts.Title: breast biopsy for a complex cyst

Posts.Content: On 9/12/2007 obnurse wrote:   On 9/6/2007 Gypsy24 wrote: Good afternoon everyone. I would like to know if anyone has had to go back for a breast biopsy for a complex cyst? My gyn dr. said it's nothing that the other dr. who read the report is just being cautious. I did have thyroid cancer and had surgery this past January. A little nervous. Thank you for any help and advice.   I was informed today that I also have complex cyst, and a biopsy was also recomended, I meet with a surgen next week and I assume I will get set up for a biopsy at that time.  I'm alittle nervous too, but from what I read on line, a  maligant complex cyst is rare, so I would rather be safe than sorry, so good luck to you and try not to worryThank you for writing back. Just a little worried since I had Thyroid surgery in January for cancer. I thought the Thyroid cyst I had was nothing. Will be going for a fine needle aspiration at the end of September. Not really sure what a complex cyst is? I did read the same. Rare the time it is malignant. Can't wait to get this over with. Good luck and positive thinking. Please let me know and I will do the same.
Posts.Title: breast biopsy for a complex cyst
